sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Epinephrine Injector Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Epinephrine Injector Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Prescription to authorized entity; use; training.
sections.text: Prescription to authorized entity; use; training.

sections.heading: Costs.  Whichever entity initiates the process of obtaining undesignated epinephrine injectors and providing training to personnel for carrying and administering undesignated epinephrine injectors shall pay for the costs of the undesignated epinephrine injectors
sections.text: Costs. Whichever entity initiates the process of obtaining undesignated epinephrine injectors and providing training to personnel for carrying and administering undesignated epinephrine injectors shall pay for the costs of the undesignated epinephrine injectors.

sections.heading: Limitations.  The use of an undesignated epinephrine injector in accordance with the requirements of this Act does not constitute the practice of medicine or any other profession that requires medical licensure
sections.text: Limitations. The use of an undesignated epinephrine injector in accordance with the requirements of this Act does not constitute the practice of medicine or any other profession that requires medical licensure.

sections.heading: Rulemaking. The Department shall adopt any rules necessary to implement and administer this Act.
sections.text: Rulemaking. The Department shall adopt any rules necessary to implement and administer this Act.
